summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ColdIQ new features: email verification, password reset, template library, annual billing with 20% discount. Backend APIs working correctly (95.5% success rate), frontend integration fully functional.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 400 for certain plan tier formats in test
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - may affect checkout flow edge cases

passed_tests: GET /api/billing/prices returns all plans with annual pricing and 20% discount
GET /api/templates properly blocks free users (Pro+ only access)
Pricing page Monthly/Annual toggle working with 20% savings display
Login page 'Forgot password?' link navigation and form submission
Templates page access control for free users
Full signup flow redirects to onboarding
Email verification flow (MOCKED - logged to database)
Annual billing calculations correct (20% discount applied)
